# IOUserAudioCustomPropertyInfo

**Structure**

A description of a custom property’s data types.

## Declaration

```swift
struct IOUserAudioCustomPropertyInfo;
```

## Discussion

The description provided by the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioCustomPropertyInfo] structure allows the host to marshal the data between the host and its clients.

## Property Metadata

- **mSelector**: The property selector of the custom property.
- **mPropertyDataType**: The data type of the of the custom property’s data.
- **mQualifierDataType**: The data type of the of the custom property’s qualifier data.

## Accessing the Data Value

- **SetQualifierAndDataValue**: Sets the custom property’s data value.
- **GetCustomPropertyValueWithQualifier**: Gets the custom property value for a given qualifier.
- **GetCustomPropertyInfo**: Gets a property info object that describes the custom property.
